short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that generates QR codes from the current page's URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generates a QR-Code of the page the user is currently on and aims to be minimal and modern as possible. Hope you love it.
